result.execSummary:
The defendant Xavier A Ferguson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Robbery with Threat of Force, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: If a Wisconsin State Prison sentence is imposed, outstanding financial obligations shall be paid from all inmate money at a rate of 25% and the balance due as a condition of extended supervision.  If extended supervision is revoked or will discharge with financial obligations owing, a judgment shall be entered.

Defendant shall not consume alcohol.

Defendnat shall not possess/consume any controlled substance without a valid prescription.

Defendant shall have no direct or indirect contact with the victims - Patrick W., Sidney R., Kayla N.

Defendant shall participate in all counseling, assessments and/or treatment programs directed by the probation agent.

Defendant shall provide DNA sample.

Defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety.

Defendant shall obtain/maintain full-time employment, schooling, or combination of both.

Defendant shall obtain/maintain  stable residence.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Xavier A Ferguson

Earnings Statement

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  PSI author also present.  PSI has been reviewed; one correction noted by counsel.  No other clarifications/corrections noted.  Statements from def's mother and def's grandfather.  Argument from State and counsel.  Statement from def.  Court proceeds to sentencing.
Letter received from Atty. Romanowich
Sentencing Memorandum - Sealed per Order to Seal 6/24/15
Psychological Evaluation by Dr. Berney - Sealed per Order to Seal 6/24/15
Letter received from S.D.
Presentence Report e-mailed to DA's office & defense counsel
Sealed
Sentencing hearing at 06-23-2015 03:00 pm
SEH set 4-30-15 at 10:00am rescheduled to 6-23-15 at 3:00pm per request of counsel, no objection from DA and consent of Court; notice sent.
Letter received from Atty Romanowich
Disposition Form
Letter received from Atty Stephanie Hanson
Sentencing hearing on April 30, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Court questions counsel and def.  Def wishes to continue w/Atty Romanowich and proceed w/entering plea today.  State moves to amend charge to Robbery of a Person by Threat of Force, 943.32(1)(b); Court so orders.  State to file amended Information w/in 48hrs.  PSI recommended w/both sides free to argue.  Def enters guilty plea to amended Ct 1.  Court finds def guilty on amended Ct 1 and orders presentence report be completed.  Court keeps bond in place pending sentencing and admonishes def re terms.  Jury trial set 2-16-15 & 2-17-15 removed from calendar.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 30, 2015 at 10:00 am.
JSH set 2-11-15 at 8:45am per req of Atty Romanowich and State - plea expected to be entered w/PSI being requested

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Def wishes to retain private counsel - Atty Matthew Ricci.  Counsel req jury trial be postponed.  Court keeps trial as scheduled; def/counsel to be prepared to go to trial at 8:15am on 2-16-15.  Court will only allow Atty Romanowich to withdraw at such time as new attorney makes an appearance.
Jury status hearing on February 10, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
JSH set 2-10-15 at 10:00am rescheduled to 2-10-15 at 3:30pm per req of counsel and consent of Court; notice sent
Jury status hearing on February 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Jeanette Kara Corbett appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Counsel rec'd final offer yesterday and expects resolution, however, def req additional week to review offer.  Counsel req adj of JSH.  Jury status hearing scheduled for February 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
If case does not settle at jury status on 1-28-15, discuss letter rec'd from DA dated 12-17-14

Jury status hearing on January 28, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Jury trial on February 16, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Offer made; counsel waiting for alternative offer and req adj.  State indicates case will not be amended to Misd.  Def enters not guilty plea and req jury trial.  Two day jury trial set to begin 2-16-15.    The Court orders all motions, including motions in limine,  be filed on or before the jury status date.  Jury trial scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:15 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for January 28, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Arraignment on December 10, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Counsel req adj to allow further pretrial - resolution expected.  Arraignment scheduled for December 10, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Hearing on November 12, 2014 at 02:45 pm.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Def waives preliminary hearing.  Court questions def and accepts waiver.  Counsel has rec'd 5 CDs of discovery and needs to review w/def.  Adj to allow pretrial - case to resolve or be set for trial at next hearing.  Hearing scheduled for November 12, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
Hearing on September 24, 2014 at 09:45 am.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper appeared for State.  Clerk: CP.  Counsel's first appearance; adj requested.  Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.  Court admonishes def re terms of bond in effect.  Hearing scheduled for September 24, 2014 at 09:45 am.

Hearing on August 18, 2014 at 09:45 am.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Katherine Romanowich of State Public Defenders Office.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State.  Clerk: CP.    Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found.  Court sets $7500 cash bond.  Def waives time limits on preliminary hearing; Court accepts waiver.    Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.  Hearing scheduled for August 18, 2014 at 09:45 am.
